doc.field: AND SOUTH [CSR] UNIT TO REDEEM STOCK

- Central and South West Corp said it Southwestern Electric Power Co subsidiary will redeem all 300,000 shares outstanding of its 8.16 pct preferred stock, par value 100 dlrs per share, on May one. It said the redemption price is 103.72 dlrs a share plus accrued and unpaid dividends from April one to May one of 68 cts per share for a total of 194.40 dlrs a share paid to shareholders.
